summary: You don\'t want to wait for having the best weapons/armors? Download it!
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]wIP9b9sMxhc[/youtube]

I add a door in the Moutains nears Riverwoods that teleport in a strange place (and a map marquer too). There is all the best amors/weapons/unique like giant mace or psichik clothes...
There is 2 cheated weapons with 1337 dmg, so insta kill and 40k gold on the last table. 
Warning: using this at low level can kill the game enjoyment. 

See video for more informations! Follow the blue light. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIP9b9sMxhc&feature=youtu.be

Thanks for download/ratings and say me if there is bug. It\'s NMM friendly normally, or just drop the .esp files in the data Skyrim folder.
(Sorry for my english, it\'s not my native language).

It\'s a update of my old moutain secret, but I change a lot of thing so I make a new file. It\'s my 2nd mod. :)

Mod you can see in the video: SkyUI and 2k skyrim textures
author: OrangeStorm
